attributes.action: Get fair electricity pricing for park home owners
attributes.additional_details: As a park home owner we are charged a high level of unit cost for electricity. This seems to be because our electricity is supplied via the park home site owner. Whilst they cannot charge us more than they are charged our unit rate charge is more than usual domestic electricity prices
attributes.background: Get energy suppliers to agree fair pricing to park home site owners

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of electricity for park home owners, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Ofgem already regulate the cost of electricity, including the maximum price for resupplying gas or electricity which has already been bought from an authorised supplier.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
